item.description:
Research

  • Dynamics of a polyelectrolyte in simple shear flow

    Kandiledath Jayasree, Raj Kumar Manna, Debapriya Banerjee, and P. B. Sunil Kumar

    J. Chem. Phys. 139, 224902 (2013)

  • Excess energy of an ultracold Fermi gas in a trapped geometry

    Shyamal Biswas, Debnarayan Jana, and Raj Kumar Manna

    Eur. Phys. J. D (2012) 66: 217
